evaluation.overall_comment:
The translation captures the overall structure and most of the technical content of the original podcast script, but it suffers from serious readability, fluency, and consistency issues. Inconsistent speaker labels, grammatical mistakes, literal renderings, and leftover editorial notes make the text feel more like a draft with annotation than a polished Spanish podcast transcript. Substantial editing is required to achieve a natural, coherent, and audience‑appropriate version.
